wisdom toad.desc: Your path is blocked by a big, fat toad eating a sandwich.  He offers you a backpack, saying it's convenient.

triton.desc: You see a tire-looking turtle.  Don't worry about him eating you, he's gluten-free and frogs make him feel bloated.

buckley.desc: You see a majestic stag sloshing around in the mud.  He looks lost...

sting.desc: You encounter a sneaky scorpion.  This story sounds familiar, but you can't put your webbed finger on it.

dawei.desc: There's another tadpole over there.  They eye you off and say you look ridiculously pink.  How rude!

tallulah.desc: You see a glorious giraffe, queen among herbivores.  She tells you that the lake is off to the east, but you can't get there from here.

violet.desc: You witness the move beautiful frog in the world.  It's love at first sight and you know you're meant for each other.

destiny.desc: You croak at a local frog and she doesn't even give you the time of day.  You're used to it, but it still hurts a little.

karen.desc: You croak at her and she asks to see your manager.  You don't have one because, well, you're a frog.
